languages.text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Сенешаль тщательно подбирает слова.{/n} "Не просто сообщать об этом, но за время вашего отсутствия на Даргонусе вспыхнула череда бунтов среди черни. Виновными в организации мятежей, подрыве экономики столицы, а также... заговоре против вас были признаны члены моей семьи".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Сенешаль тщательно подбирает слова.{/n} "Не просто сообщать об этом, но за время вашего отсутствия на Даргонусе вспыхнула череда бунтов среди черни. Виновными в организации мятежей, подрыве экономики столицы, а также... заговоре против вас были признаны члены моей семьи".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Сенешаль тщательно подбирает слова.{/n} "Не просто сообщать об этом, но за время вашего отсутствия на Даргонусе вспыхнула череда бунтов среди черни. Виновными в организации мятежей, подрыве экономики столицы, а также... заговоре против вас были признаны члены моей семьи".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "This is not easy to say, but while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of organising those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "This is not easy to say, but while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of organising those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人……”{n}阿贝拉德谨慎地斟酌着他的用词。{/n}“我不得不通知您，您不在的这段期间，达戈努斯的民众之中发生了多起叛乱事故。总督指控这些犯罪分子策划叛乱，破坏了首都的经济……甚至策划反对您本人。总督认为这些事故的幕后黑手是我的家人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……”{n}阿贝拉德谨慎地斟酌着他的用词。{/n}“我不得不通知您，您不在的这段期间，达戈努斯的民众之中发生了多起叛乱事故。总督指控这些犯罪分子策划叛乱，破坏了首都的经济……甚至策划反对您本人。总督认为这些事故的幕后黑手是我的家人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Der Truchsess wägt seine Worte vorsichtig ab.{/n} "Ich muss leider berichten, dass es in Dargonus während Eurer Abwesenheit zu einer Reihe von Aufständen im Pöbel gekommen ist. Mitglieder meiner Familie wurden angeklagt, diese Aufstände angezettelt, die Wirtschaft der Hauptstadt untergraben und ... sich gegen Euch verschworen zu haben."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Der Truchsess wägt seine Worte vorsichtig ab.{/n} "Ich muss leider berichten, dass es in Dargonus während Eurer Abwesenheit zu einer Reihe von Aufständen im Pöbel gekommen ist. Mitglieder meiner Familie wurden angeklagt, diese Aufstände angezettelt, die Wirtschaft der Hauptstadt untergraben und ... sich gegen Euch verschworen zu haben.
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}El senescal escoge cuidadosamente sus palabras.{/n} «Tengo el triste deber de informarle de que, en su ausencia, los plebeyos de Dargonus han organizado una serie de revueltas. Se han presentado cargos contra mi familia presuntamente por instigar esas revueltas, socavar la economía de la capital y... conspirar contra usted».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}El senescal escoge cuidadosamente sus palabras.{/n} «Tengo el triste deber de informarle de que, en su ausencia, los plebeyos de Dargonus han organizado una serie de revueltas. Se han presentado cargos contra mi familia presuntamente por instigar esas revueltas, socavar la economía de la capital y... conspirar contra usted».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Le sénéchal s'interrompt un instant, pesant soigneusement ses mots, puis il continue :{/n} « Je suis au regret de vous annoncer qu'en votre absence, la populace de Dargonus s'est révoltée à plusieurs reprises. Les membres de ma famille ont été accusés d'avoir organisé ces soulèvements, sapé l'économie de la capitale et... conspiré contre vous. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Le sénéchal s'interrompt un instant, pesant soigneusement ses mots, puis il continue :{/n} « Je suis au regret de vous annoncer qu'en votre absence, la populace de Dargonus s'est révoltée à plusieurs reprises. Les membres de ma famille ont été accusés d'avoir organisé ces soulèvements, sapé l'économie de la capitale et... conspiré contre vous. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン」{n}家令長は慎重に言葉を選んでいる。{/n}「あなたが留守の間に、ダルゴナスでは暴徒たちが反乱を起こしました。反乱を指揮し、首都の経済を弱体化させ、そして…あなたに対する陰謀を企てたという容疑が、私の家族に対してかけられました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン」{n}家令長は慎重に言葉を選んでいる。{/n}「あなたが留守の間に、ダルゴナスでは暴徒たちが反乱を起こしました。反乱を指揮し、首都の経済を弱体化させ、そして…あなたに対する陰謀を企てたという容疑が、私の家族に対してかけられました」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Seneşal, sözlerini dikkatle seçiyor.{/n} "Üzülerek söylüyorum ki siz yokken Dargonus'ta ayaktakımı isyana kalkıştı. Ailem; isyan çıkarmak, başkentin ekonomisine zarar vermek ve... Size komplo kurmak ile suçlandı."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Seneschal weighs his words carefully.{/n} "I hate to say that while you were away, Dargonus saw a series of revolts among its rabble. Charges of orchestrating those revolts, undermining the capital's economy, and... conspiring against you were brought against my family members."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Seneşal, sözlerini dikkatle seçiyor.{/n} "Üzülerek söylüyorum ki siz yokken Dargonus ayaktakımı arasında bazı isyanlar yükseldi. İsyanları düzenleme, başkentin ekonomisine zarar verme ve... Size komplo kurma suçları aile üyelerime bildirildi."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
